channel.title: 🏢 Boğaziçi University on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Building Foundations for Natural Language Processing of Historical Turkish: Resources and Models
item.description: First-ever resources (NER dataset, dependency treebank, and corpus) and models for historical Turkish NLP are introduced, significantly advancing research capabilities in this underexplored field.
